snippet: The two dramas include "Low Winter Sun," a crime drama about a Detroit detective who goes to the dark side, and "Untitled LaGravenese & Goldwyn Project," a legal thriller.
abstract: The two dramas include "Low Winter Sun," a crime drama about a Detroit detective who goes to the dark side, and "Untitled LaGravenese & Goldwyn Project," a legal thriller.

headline.main: AMC Orders Two New Drama Pilots
